text: (gentle upbeat music)
- My name is Alina Dima,

I'm a senior IoT architect
for AWS Professional Services,
and I'm based in Berlin, in Germany.
I have always been an engineer at heart,

and I've got plenty of software
engineering experience,

and I joined AWS in a
bit of a different role,
as an architect.

For the IoT architect role
in Professional Services,
you need a lot of technical knowledge.
You need to understand how to build
using different pieces of the puzzle,
so different building blocks.

The work that we are doing
in professional services

has an impact on accelerating
the customer outcomes.
If someone is interested in joining AWS,
I would say go for it (laughs).

I think people sometimes
can be intimidated
or believe they're not good enough

or believe that they don't
have enough experience.
So when you go for an AWS interview,

just talk about the
work that you have done,
and the work you're passionate about,

and also be honest with the
things you don't get now,
but you're willing to learn.
(gentle music)
